caption: The video shows the leaders and colleagues of two different forces meeting. After negotiation, one of the parties took out a contract and signed it in person. The other side, after seeing them all sign the papers, stood up and left. Cut to a ruined battleground town. Two soldiers woke up early in the morning, left the town, and walked on a prairie. The two soldiers decided to go back to a big house to steal things.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, decades ago, now, or in the future?
global.answer: It happens decades ago, most likely during a world war.

global.question: Are there more then five different places appear in the video(scene switch doesn't necessarily means a place change)?
Is there more than five different characters appear(not including people in the background)?
what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
global.answer: Both at day time and at night time.
